meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by pyrolysis.
meanings.sent1: The pyrolytic process converts wood into charcoal.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the pyrolytic properties of different materials.
meanings.sent3: The pyrolytic oven turned the food into a delicious crispy texture.
meanings.sent4: Her pyrolytic wit burned through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The pyrolytic flames danced in the night, mesmerizing all who watched.

meanings.sent1: The pyrolytic material easily breaks down under high heat.
meanings.sent2: The plastic was not pyrolytic and melted instead of decomposing.
meanings.sent3: The pyrolytic sponge seemed to disappear when exposed to extreme temperatures.
meanings.sent4: His pyrolytic resolve remained strong even in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The pyrolytic nature of the substance made it perfect for the experiment.
